data.name: RPG Maker MV - MT Tiny Tales Battlers - Monstrous Uprising
data.detailed_description:
B Tiny Tales is designed for those who want to create a cutesy yet epic adventure scenario for their game. In MT Tiny Tales Monstrous Uprising we cover a thorough kit of monsters and creatures

Features:

- 100 Monsters
- Various convenient resizes (2x and 3x) to fit with different resolutions!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
